AltName.entry: BURNGREAVE MENS ACTIVITY AND CONVERSATION CLUB (BMAC)

Desc.entry: A voluntary organisation which provides a meeting place for men in the Burngreave area, whose first language is not English, to meet and socialise and practise their English, centred around social activities.

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - GENERAL SUPPORT ORGANISATIONS
EDUCATION - ENGLISH FOR SPEAKERS OF OTHER LANGUAGES (ESOL)
